links.title: Trump says he thinks US will make a trade deal with China - Times of India
links.description: WASHINGTON: US President Donald Trump, who has put China on backfoot by an aggressive policy of imposing additional tariffs on their imports, has said that he thinks America is going to make a trade deal with Beijing. Having imposed additional import duties of Chinese products worth $250 billion, Trump said he can add another $275 billion.

links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.
